aboutPreview.paragraph1: I'm a Computer Science and Engineering student at The Ohio State University with a minor in Mathematics and a specialization in Artificial Intelligence.
aboutPreview.paragraph2: From full-stack web applications to game development and machine learning experiments, I love exploring new technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible with code.
